email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 50,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN QUEEN for this shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 80,000 and an LOA of 250m. Our starting freight quote is USD 25 per metric ton.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 25 per MT seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the laycan dates and the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your response.
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Emily,

The laycan dates for OCEAN QUEEN are from October 15 to October 20, 2023. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 23 per MT. Does this meet your requirements?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the revised quote. We accept the rate of USD 23 per MT. Could you confirm the laycan dates and provide the final details for the shipment?

Best regards,
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: OCEAN QUEEN
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I can confirm the laycan dates as October 15 to October 20, 2023. The demurrage rate remains at USD 15,000 per day. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork to finalize the shipment.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: OCEAN QUEEN
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We are keen to finalize everything promptly to ensure a smooth operation of the shipment.

Thank you for all your efforts in accommodating our requests.

Best regards,
Emily Clark
